instructions_to_main_agent: IMPLEMENT DARK MODE BY DEFAULT. Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the root/html element.
Use the 'Outfit' font for all headings to give a distinct brand feel. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for the actual lyrics text area.
The 'Generate' page should feel like a cockpit. The left panel is the instrument, the right panel is the stage.
For the 'SongSpec' controls, use Shadcn Sliders and Selects, but style them with the 'accent' color (Electric Violet).
The Lyrics Editor should NOT look like a standard text input. Remove borders, increase line height, center it visually (max-w-2xl mx-auto).
Use 'Sonner' for all notifications (Generation complete, Saved, etc.).
Ensure the 'Library' cards have a subtle glow on hover using the primary color.
Do not use generic gray backgrounds. Use the specific hex codes provided in the palette.
Add the noise texture overlay to the entire app for a 'film grain' / 'analog' feel.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts without purpose.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Never use transparent backgrounds without a blur or scrim.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
